Articles.Content: Haven't watched it yet but looking forward to it!

The Questions and topics are thoughtfully added to the scrollbar.

Highlights:

Spoiler

There will be more updates before Colonies.

Colonies will include new gameplay modes, including long term Science Collection.

There will be 'supply flights' to the Orbital Colonies, but this is a later feature.

Precision Maneuver Nodes and Alarm Clock as Stock is definitely planned, but no word on When.

Colonies will be put anywhere you pick.

Colony Parts will be counted in dozens.

Automated Delivery Routes is planned more for the Resources Update than the Colony Update, to avoid griding deliveries to Colonies in the meantime.

There's some discussion about the difference between Craft and Workspace in the VAB.

Quote

Colonies will be put anywhere you pick.

Someone will build a Dyson sphere around Kerbol at some point.

Edited March 3 by Tony Tony Chopper

With a game of this complexity, the level of planning would be immense, and must be difficult to explain to a big team. I can definitely relate to that experience of scrambling to put out the fires but that takes longer than just taking it slowly and following a plan. It's a constant challenge because it's so counter-intuitive.

I've not watched the video yet, but the last bullet point:

  • Asparagus Staging like KSP1 - When ?

Is the answer, "Uh, you already can"?

Because I've been doing asparagus staging since I started playing KSP2, after Science dropped.
